force.description: Assume "yes" is the answer to any question urpmi has to ask. Corresponds to the C(--force) option for I(urpmi).

update_cache.description: update the package database first C(urpmi.update -a).

pkg.description: name of package to install, upgrade or remove.

no-recommends.description: Corresponds to the C(--no-recommends) option for I(urpmi).
